Package org.jgum.traversal

Classes in this package implement common routines for traversing a category graph.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DuplicatesDetectionIterator<T>
    An iterator that remembers the visited categories.
    StopOnConditionIterable<U>  
    StopOnConditionIterable.StopOnConditionIterator<T>  
    StopUntilConditionIterable<U>  
    StopUntilConditionIterable.StopUntilConditionIterator<T>  
    TraversalPolicy<T extends Category>
    A class facilitating the definition of common linearization functions in terms of few intuitive parameters.
    TraversalPolicy.CategoryTraverser<T extends Category>  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    RedundancyCheck
    Determines if and how redundancies should be eliminated from a list of categories generated by a traversal strategy of a linearization function.
    SearchStrategy
    Determines how the next nodes in a hierarchical graph of categories should be visited.

Package org.jgum.traversal Description

Classes in this package implement common routines for traversing a category graph.
